import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { OwlOptions } from 'ngx-owl-carousel-o'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { TestimonialsService } from '../services/testimonials.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-testimonial', templateUrl: './testimonial.component.html', styleUrls: ['./testimonial.component.css'] }) export class TestimonialComponent { @Input() testimonials:any; constructor(private testimonialsService:TestimonialsService){} // owl courser// customOptions: OwlOptions = { loop: true, mouseDrag: true, touchDrag: false, pullDrag: false, dots: false, navSpeed: 700, navText: ['', ''], responsive: { 0: { items: 1 }, 400: { items: 1 }, 740: { items: 2 }, 940: { items: 3 } }, nav: true } }
